div.p: This value set defines the set of codes for identifying the reason why the expected result in Observation.value[x] is missing.
This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

ul.li: Include all codes defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/data-absent-reason

publisher.value: HL7 International - Orders and Observations WG

description.value: This value set defines the set of codes for identifying the reason why the expected result in Observation.value[x] is missing.
